string.text: Night vision technology installation for low light conditions. Relies on night-useful spectral and intensity range techniques to sense radiation that is invisible to the human eye.
An improvement to the night vision technology, introducing a better system light gain, system resolution and photo-sensitivity to increase visual quality.

An improvement to the night vision technology, introducing better system light gain, system resolution and photo-sensitivity to increase the visual quality, as well as a white phosphor display for better acuity and reduced eye impairment.
